turkish_example_sentence: O bu eski hikayeyi düşünmese, mutlu kalabilir.
english_example_sentence: If he/she were not to think about this old story, he/she could remain happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он/она не думал/а об этой старой истории, он/она смог бы остаться счастливым/ой.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O bu eski hikayeyi ______, mutlu kalabilir.
